attributes.action: Ban fireworks being bought by individuals in stores.
attributes.additional_details: cats, foxes etc. have to have tablets shoved down their throats or sprays to be calm, which don’t actually work unless given a few days prior. You cannot determine this as they are getting earlier & earlier every year.
attributes.background: I would like the government to make buying fireworks as a member of the public illegal. This should only be done by licensed professionals at organised displays. That way animal both living outside & inside only have to endure this once a year rather than for over a 7 day period. Animals like dogs-

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:

Ban the sale of fireworks to the general public:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/639319
